name: Braised Carrots With Italian Parsley
keywords: butter, carrot, parsley, side dish, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 pound of carrots, scraped and sliced thin
Freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a heavy saucepan, melt 1 tablespoon of the butter. Add carrots, nutmeg and cinnamon, season with pepper and toss, coating carrots with butter. Continue cooking for a couple of minutes, then add water. Simmer uncovered for about 10 minutes. Carrot slices should be tender and the water evaporated.
Whisk in remaining butter and lemon juice. Fold in the parsley leaves and serve.
